actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 to provide that local labor organizations may not be consolidated unless such consolidation has been approved by majority vote of the members of each local labor organization to be consolidated.

summary.text: Revises the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act to provide that local labor organizations may not be consolidated unless such consolidation has been approved by majority vote of the members of each local labor organization to be consolidated.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Labor-Management Reporting and Disclosure Act of 1959 to provide that local labor organizations may not be consolidated unless such consolidation has been approved by majority vote of the members of each local labor organization to be consolidated.
